 2024-12902024-12-05PCH
ActNational Arts Centre Act
PrecisAppointment of LINE BEAUCHAMP of Saint-Bruno-de-Montarville, Quebec, to be a member of the Board of Trustees of the National Arts Centre Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
